title: Glasgow
name: Glasgow Central Station
directions: between Union and Hope Streets, train: Glasgow Central
phone: General station enquiries: +44 845 711-4141 (premium rate from mobiles & some landlines)
content: The city's principal railway terminus, which is worth entering for its grand interior, which you can access from Gordon Street on the north side of the building. On the exterior, a feature of note is the massive glass walled bridge (known as the ''Hielanman's Umbrella'') which spans Argyle Street and holds up the tracks and platforms.
